context_bundle.summary: PAD loop actions: Loop (counter), Loop Condition (while), For Each (collection). Exit Loop breaks, Next Loop skips. %LoopIndex% and %CurrentItem% vars

onboarding.quick_start: Loop from 1 to 10 step 1 -> %LoopIndex%. For each CurrentItem in %List% -> %CurrentItem%. Loop while %Condition% = True
common_patterns: If %Found% = True Then Exit Loop End
If %Item% = '' Then Next Loop End (skip invalid)
known_errors: Infinite loop if condition never false - add Exit Loop safety
Modifying list during For Each can cause issues
